data.Name: Vortex
data.Description: This event is all General Admission and outside. 1:00 PM Doors/1:30 Show Rain Or Shine All acts are subject to change without warning. 100 gecs BLADEE DIXON SAD NIGHT DYNAMITE AVALON EMERSON JOSH BUTLER KEVIN SAUNDERSON BALTRA MAJOR LEAGUE DJZ ABSOLUTE.
